channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft Suddenly Offers Windows 10 Update In Store—Buy Now
item.description: You can now get this in store, if you want to keep using Windows 10.

item.title: How Adobe’s New AI Tools Empower Creators In 2025
item.description: As AI tools transform the way creators work, Adobe ensures they’re putting pro-level creative power directly into creators’ hands.

item.title: Where Are We At With Smart Glasses?
item.description: Smart glasses and AR evolve through Meta, Magic Leap, and Lamina1, merging creative vision with blockchain-enabled metaverse tools.
